data.eml:eml: A revision of the North Atlantic amphipod genus Normanion (Crustacea: Amphipoda: Lysianassoidea)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kilgallen, Niamh M., Myers, Alan A., Grath, David M (2006): A revision of the North Atlantic amphipod genus Normanion (Crustacea: Amphipoda: Lysianassoidea). Zootaxa 1363: 1-21, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.174732
